name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
description: Se scarichi la versione Wii U™, ottieni gratis anche Nintendo 3DS™! (I tuoi Wii U e Nintendo 3DS devono essere collegati con lo stesso Nintendo Network ID.) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS. Il lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS sarà disponibile quest'anno.
